The multiplayer beta felt a little too Halo to me, which is not a compliment. I know you aim down the sights in Crysis, which is more like COD, but 
the game seems to play like an extreme mix of either brainless Run-N-Gun or gratuitious longrange sniping. That feels like Halo to me, in spirit. 

I like games that tend to emphasis more of the mid-range firefight. I think COD plays more at mid-range. Certainly Battlefield does, which is my all-time favorite MP game.

I'm not sure this game is worth buying just for the MP. I wouldn't argue that it's worth buying though.
